About Me

I’m a dude who needs to write stuff down to remember it. (Seriously: how many times have I had to look up how to change the settings on a VPS to stop timing out my SSH connections so soon?)

I had the immense good fortune to study philosophy and the great books at St. John’s College (I even had my first web job there as their student webmaster). I’ve spent over five years as a full-time front-end developer and web designer (in varying proportions). Right now I’m working as a senior front-end developer at AOL.
